wikimedia-acct_creation_throttle_hit:
Error message at [[Special:CreateAccount]].

"in the last day" precisely means: during the lasts 86400 seconds (24 hours) ending right now.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of accounts
wikimedia-createacct-helpusername: Message in new create account form providing guidance for username.
wikimedia-prefs-user-downloaddata-help-m:
This message shows where to download the user's data from other wikis.
* $1 - The username with spaces replaced by underscores, for including in links
wikimedia-createacct-imgcaptcha-help: Help text in vertical-layout create account form for image CAPTCHA input field when repositioned by JavaScript.
wikimedia-centralauth-login-error-locked:
Replaces the standard {{msg-mw|centralauth-login-error-locked}} with a custom message for WMF wikis explaining the user why they cannot log in and how to contact the stewards if in doubt.

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the account for GENDER use.
createacct-helpusername-url:
The URL of a page providing username guidance for the wiki.
Used as a link in the {{msg-mw|Createacct-helpusername}} on WMF wikis.
wikimedia-checkuser-api-useragent-client:
A Wikimedia-specific customization of the message {{mw-msg|Checkuser-api-useragent-clienthints-explanation}}

Message shown in the response to the POST request to /checkuser/v0/useragent-clienthints/{type}/{id} if the request is successful. This is used to explain what this API request does, provides links to the privacy policy and access to nonpublic data policy, and links to a MediaWiki page explaining the use of client hints in more detail.
wikimedia-checkuser-toollinks: The links provided to a CheckUser when preforming a check on a wiki without a message override.
wikimedia-delete-toobig:
Replaces the standard {{msg-mw|delete-toobig}} message with a custom message for WMF wikis, directing administrators to contact the stewards, which can delete such pages.
Parameters:
* $1 - the upper limit of number of revisions the page has.
wikimedia-discussiontools-replywidget-te:
Terms of use and copyright warning shown when adding or editing a comment using DiscussionTools. Replace Terms_of_Use in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/fr for French.

Parameters:
* $1 – label of the button to be clicked, e.g. {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-reply}}
* $2 – list of license names, such as {{msg-mw|wikimedia-license-links}} (or a single name)
* $3 – number of license names, for PLURAL
wikimedia-feedback-termsofuse: Label for agreeing to the Wikimedia terms of use with a link to the official terms of use page.
wikimedia-flow-terms-of-use-new-topic:
Terms of use and copyright warning shown when adding a new topic to a Flow board. Replace Terms_of_Use in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/fr for French.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Flow-newtopic-save}}.

Parameters:
* $1 – list of license names, such as {{msg-mw|wikimedia-license-links}} (or a single name)
* $2 – number of license names, for PLURAL
wikimedia-flow-terms-of-use-reply:
Terms of use and copyright warning shown when adding a reply at a Flow board. Replace Terms_of_Use in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/fr for French.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Flow-reply-link}}.

Parameters:
* $1 – list of license names, such as {{msg-mw|wikimedia-license-links}} (or a single name)
* $2 – number of license names, for PLURAL
wikimedia-flow-terms-of-use-edit:
Terms of use and copyright warning shown when editing the header or an existing topic or message at a Flow board. Replace Terms_of_Use in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/fr for French.

Parameters:
* $1 – list of license names, such as {{msg-mw|wikimedia-license-links}} (or a single name)
* $2 – number of license names, for PLURAL
wikimedia-flow-terms-of-use-summarize:
Terms of use and copyright warning shown when summarizing a Flow topic. Replace Terms_of_Use in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/fr for French.

Refers to {{msg-mw|flow-topic-action-update-topic-summary}}.

Parameters:
* $1 – list of license names, such as {{msg-mw|wikimedia-license-links}} (or a single name)
* $2 – number of license names, for PLURAL
wikimedia-flow-terms-of-use-lock-topic:
Terms of use and copyright warning shown when closing a Flow topic. Replace Terms_of_Use in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/fr for French.

Refers to {{msg-mw|flow-topic-action-lock-topic}}.

Parameters:
* $1 – list of license names, such as {{msg-mw|wikimedia-license-links}} (or a single name)
* $2 – number of license names, for PLURAL
wikimedia-flow-terms-of-use-unlock-topic:
Terms of use and copyright warning shown when reopening a Flow topic. Replace Terms_of_Use in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use/fr for French.

Refers to {{msg-mw|flow-topic-action-unlock-topic}}.

Parameters:
* $1 – list of license names, such as {{msg-mw|wikimedia-license-links}} (or a single name)
* $2 – number of license names, for PLURAL
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-ip:
A message shown to a [[mw:Extension:GlobalBlocking|globally blocked]] user trying to edit.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Emailuser}} and is a customised version of {{msg-mw|globalblocking-ipblocked}}.

This message is similar to a [[MediaWiki:Blockedtext|MediaWiki core message]].

Parameters:
* $1 - the blocking sysop (with a link to their user page if they are a local user)
* $2 - the reason for the block
* $3 - the current IP address of the blocked user
* $4 - (Unused) the blocking sysop's username (plain text, without the link)
* $5 - the unique numeric identifier of the block
* $6 - the expiry of the block
* $7 - the intended target of the block (what the blocking user specified in the blocking form)
* $8 - the timestamp when the block started
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-ran:
A message shown to a [[mw:Extension:GlobalBlocking|globally blocked]] user trying to edit through a globally blocked IP range.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Emailuser}} and is a customised version of {{msg-mw|globalblocking-ipblocked-range}}.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Emailuser}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - the blocking sysop (with a link to their user page if they are a local user)
* $2 - the reason for the block
* $3 - the current IP address of the blocked user
* $4 - (Unused) the blocking sysop's username (plain text, without the link)
* $5 - the unique numeric identifier of the block
* $6 - the expiry of the block
* $7 - the intended target of the block (what the blocking user specified in the blocking form)
* $8 - the timestamp when the block started
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-xff:
A message shown to users who have one or more proxies in their XFF header whose IP is blocked.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Emailuser}} and is a customised version of {{msg-mw|globalblocking-ipblocked-xff}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - the blocking sysop (with a link to their user page if they are a local user)
* $2 - the reason for the block
* $3 - the current IP address of the blocked user
* $4 - (Unused) the blocking sysop's username (plain text, without the link)
* $5 - the unique numeric identifier of the block
* $6 - the expiry of the block
* $7 - the intended target of the block (what the blocking user specified in the blocking form)
* $8 - the timestamp when the block started
wikimedia-globalrenamequeue-email-body-a:
Email body for approved request.

* $1 is the old username
* $2 is the new username.
wikimedia-globalrenamequeue-email-body-r:
Email body for rejected request.

* $1 is the old username.
* $2 is the new username.
* $3 is the message left by the user who processed the request.
wikimedia-interfaceadmin-info: Part of the error message shown when someone with the editinterface right but without the appropriate editsite* right tries to edit a sitewide CSS/JSON/JS page. "group-interface-admin" is {{msg-mw|group-interface-admin}}.
wikimedia-mwoauthserver-invalid-user: Error message shown when someone tries to authorize an OAuth application but their user account is not set up properly.
wikimedia-sitematrix-summary: Text for the special page "Special:SiteMatrix" listing all Wikimedia wikis
wikimedia-sulrenamewarning-usenew:
Instructions to user to login with new name in the future

* $1 is the user's new name
wikimedia-urlshortener-disabled: Error message shown when the user tries to create a new shortened url on other wikis than meta.wikimedia.org.
wikimedia-apierror-urlshortener-disabled: Error message sent by API when the user tries to create a new shortened URL on wikis other than meta.wikimedia.org.
wikimedia-urlshortener-badaccessgroups: Error message shown when user tries to create new shortned url without the needed rights, should only be shown on wikis other than meta.wikimedia.org.
wikimedia-apierror-urlshortener-permissi: Error message sent by API when the user tries to create a new shortened URL without the necessary rights. Should only be shown on wikis other than meta.wikimedia.org.
wikimedia-webauthn-module-description: Description of WebAuthn module used on Special:OATHManage
wikimedia-webauthn-ui-login-prompt: Message explaining user-required actions on login
wikimedia-mwoauth-form-privacypolicy-lin:
Wikitext link pointing to the Wikimedia Foundation privacy policy for all sites. Replace Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Privacy_policy in the URL with Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Privacy_policy/''your_language'', for example, Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Privacy_policy/fr for French..
{{Identical|Privacy policy}}
wikimedia-notification-body-oathauth-dis:
Notification body text for when two-factor authentication has been disabled by an administrator or sysadmin.
$2 - Name of user for GENDER.
wikimedia-similareditors-error-default: Error message displayed when no error key is specified
wikimedia-centralauth-admin-log-otherwik: Used on [[Special:CentralAuth]] on wikis other than meta for locked account to point towards the logs on Meta-Wiki.
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-all: Used as a component of a global block message.
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-on-: Used as a component of a global block message.
Used as a component of a global block message.
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-ip-: Used as a component of a global block message. $1 - the blocked range.
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-pro: Used as a component of a global block message. $1 - the blocked proxy address.
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-mis: Used as a component of a global block message.
Used as a component of a global block message.
